name: createTempLivingRoomMsg

message.message:
<-------------  Available System Commands  ------------->
/help: Display this help panel
/alarm: Get latest alarm status
/tempLivingRoom: Get latest Living Room temperature
/tempBedroom: Get latest Bedroom temperature
/history: Displays the burglary attemps caught by sensors and alarm
/errors: Display detected device malfunctions
/healthcheck: Check the smart-home-system status

name: gerErrorsMsg
getErrorsDbQuery
getBurglaryAttemptsDbQuery
func:
msg = {}

msg.topic =`    SELECT date_time
                FROM
                (SELECT DISTINCT a.date_time 
                FROM alarm a
                LEFT JOIN motion_sensor ms 
                ON a.date_time = ms.date_time 
                WHERE a.status = 1 AND ms.status = 1) AS x
                LEFT JOIN 
                (
                SELECT DISTINCT  a.date_time as date_time2
                FROM alarm a
                LEFT JOIN magnet_sensor ms 
                ON a.date_time = ms.date_time 
                WHERE a.status = 1 AND ms.status = 1) AS y
                ON x.date_time = y.date_time2
                `

return msg;
// message = `Alarm status is ${}`

// return { msg }
